Detailed Description

Represents a position inside a grid.

Internal helper class of BaseConnectionManager. This class provides some converting functions from a Coord to a GridCoord.

Definition at line 33 of file BaseConnectionManager.h.

Creates a GridCoord from a given Coord by dividing the x,y and z-values by "gridCellWidth". The dimension of the GridCoord depends on the Coord.

Definition at line 77 of file BaseConnectionManager.h.

References Coord::getX(), Coord::getY(), Coord::getZ(), Coord::is2D(), BaseConnectionManager::BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord::use2D, BaseConnectionManager::BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord::x, BaseConnectionManager::BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord::y, and BaseConnectionManager::BaseConnectionManager::GridCoord::z.

00077                                                               {

00080             z = static_cast<int>(c.getZ() / gridCellWidth);
